alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 3:26AM PST until February 22 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast California, southern Nevada and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ to 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Periods of blowing dust may also occur resulting in lowered driving visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
